links.to_node: Your girlfriend may continue to rely on you for financial and emotional support, potentially delaying her independence and ability to thrive on her own.
You may continue to feel guilty and conflicted about the situation, which could lead to emotional strain and dissatisfaction in the relationship.
Your girlfriend may not have the opportunity to find someone who truly loves her and wants to build a future with her, as you are still in the relationship despite not seeing a future with her.
Your girlfriend may struggle to improve her English and integrate into American society, as she may continue to rely on you for communication and support.
You may miss out on the opportunity to find a more fulfilling and compatible relationship, as you are staying in a relationship out of a sense of obligation rather than genuine love and commitment.
